name: beta-kubernetes
preInstallNotes:
Kubernetes on DC/OS is currently in Beta and should not be used in production.

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/beta-kubernetes
	Issues: https://github.com/mesosphere/dcos-kubernetes-quickstart/issues

	If you installed from the UI, enter `dcos package install beta-kubernetes --cli` from the DC/OS CLI to install the Beta Kubernetes CLI subcommands.
